name: Read The Notice!
description:
Ever wonder what would happen if you mixed sleeping pills with chicken butter? Well, wonder no more!

In this 2D platformer, you'll take on the role of a girl who's turned into a monster after a sleepless night and a poorly read prescription. The only way to return to human form? Collecting ingredients to whip up a magical chicken butter.

It's like the ultimate hangover cure, but with more feathers and less regret. Will you be able to undo the unexpected side effects of a careless night? Only one way to find out!

Have fun !

NOTE: Some elements are clickable, be aware of cursor changes!

Credits :

Programmer: Q. Ackermann

Beautiful Pixel Art by chloe2405

Nice Level Design by Étienne Corriveau

Special Thanks to L. Garlatti (for some things)

Music : A Night Of Dizzy Spell, Eric Skiff / 8 bit Dungeon Level, Kevin MacLeod

Sound effects: JDWasabi https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack
